title: Add 1s bouquet fade-in and subtle pulsing glow on the Yes (accepted) page

requirements.text: On the accepted (Yes) view, animate the 2D rose bouquet image so it fades in over 1 second when the view is shown (do not change the fade-in timing for other sections like the question/declined views).
acceptanceCriteria: When transitioning into the accepted view, only the bouquet image transitions from invisible to visible with a 1.0s fade-in.
The existing .fade-in animation used elsewhere (currently 0.6s) remains unchanged for non-bouquet content.
The bouquet image remains the same size/footprint as before (w-56 h-56 object-contain).
With prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the bouquet does not animate (or uses a near-instant transition).

requirements.text: Add a subtle background glow behind the 2D rose bouquet image on the accepted (Yes) view, and make the glow gently pulse continuously without affecting layout or overlapping text.
acceptanceCriteria: A soft, subtle glow is visible behind the bouquet image in the accepted view.
The glow gently pulses (smooth in/out) and does not distract from readability of surrounding text.
The glow is layered behind the bouquet image (no tint over the bouquet artwork itself).
With prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the glow does not pulse (static glow or removed).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not introduce additional backend services; keep backend as a single Motoko actor (no backend changes expected for this request).
nonGoals: Do not change any existing accepted-view copy/text content.
Do not regenerate or modify the existing bouquet image asset file.
